Articles.Content:
So I have a buddy that works for a company that runs airsoft milsim events and he's in need of a simple program to imitate a file transfer. This may either pay or involve some free swag. I know a lot of you guys are redditors and I just have no clue what subreddit to look at to get a hold of the right people. I figured a lot of modders might have the qualifications needed for this so I'm asking here. If you can't help, can you point me in the right direction?

Details for those interested.

-UAL002

So I have a buddy that works for a company that runs airsoft milsim events and he's in need of a simple program to imitate a file transfer. This may either pay or involve some free swag. I know a lot of you guys are redditors and I just have no clue what subreddit to look at to get a hold of the right people. I figured a lot of modders might have the qualifications needed for this so I'm asking here. If you can't help, can you point me in the right direction?

Details for those interested.

-UAL002

PM me with some details pls. I am interested in this. not for the pay just for the sweg XD. also, what file transfer is being imitated? is that in the details?
PM sent, I forgot to mention swag. Honestly probably some patches, a tshirt or some hats or whatever. Maybe we can convince them to send some cash paypal or something.

a minecraft buycraft voucher would be nice XD
